name: Mixing Wizards: A Magical Turf Wars Simulator
name_original: Mixing Wizards: A Magical Turf Wars Simulator
description:
A small game about wizards. You can mix them up!

The game is for Pixel Weekend #2 jam.

It's our first game jam!

Controls when selecting action:

S - Toggle spell window on/off

LMB - Fusion/Skip/Toggle HP if over those buttons; select spell

Controls on spell cast window:

Mouse wheel - Select ally/enemy to attack

RMB - Cast current spell

Q - Back to selecting action

Controls in fusion window:

Mouse wheel - Select 1st/2nd ally for fusion

RMB - Select 1st ally and start selecting 2nd; confirm fusion (if 1st is selected)

Q - Back to selecting action

Made by three-man team:

me - The tea-loving coder

https://sat9.itch.io/ - The sound and tracks guy
